title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Education
body: Education Washita Battlefield offers many opportunities for teachers to incorporate our history and culture inÂ the classroom! Lesson plans are available under Parks as Classrooms. Teachers, bring students out for a field-trip at Washita.                 Washita Hosts Military Staff Rides Officers from Ft. Leavenworth, Ft. Hood, and Ft. Sill bring soldiers to Washita to analyze tactics used during the battle. Read More        Park Recruiting for Teacher-Ranger-Teacher Program The National Park Service Teacher Ranger Teacher (TRT) program is an extended professional development opportunity for educators from K-12 schools. Read More        Dial and Discover Tour Cell phone audio tours are available on the walking trail at the battlesite! Read More
